Class DuelBuilderManager

java.lang.Object
com.conquest.guiHandler.guiBuildingHandler.DuelBuilderManager
public class DuelBuilderManager extends Object
ðŸŽ¯ DuelBuilderManager Manages all active DuelBuilderSessions per player. Handles timeout logic, GUI page tracking, and lifecycle clearing.
